snippet.title: In Defense of Aliens - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
In Defense of Aliens is a fast-paced combination of tower defense and high-octane 3rd player combat. We're releasing on Steam Early Access in summer, 2019. Join us at https://discord.gg/chTfZhb  for instant alpha access!

Add us to your Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/984220/In_Defense_of_Aliens/
